thread.section_title: ASAP Tickets 6000+ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ASAP Tickets 6000+ | www.asaptickets.com
thread.title: Legarth

author: Legarth
title: Legarth
text:
Tina was remarkable, she was patient with my frequent mind changes on dates and layovers, Seattle to Johannesburg via Amsterdam for several days on the return.
We worked together, found the best itineraries and price.
I am a long time experienced international traveler and usually don't use agencies due to my distrust. I was pleasantly surprised to find; this company is genuine and give the cheapest prices to be found
I recommend ASAP
